name: Serhii Untilov
brief: Hi, I'm Serhii Untilov. A Full-stack Web Developer based in Irpin, Ukraine.

about.title: Full-stack Web Developer based in Irpin, Ukraine
description: My name is Serhii, and I'm a Full-stack Web Developer. My mission is to create and develop fully functional, robust web applications for users.
Currently, my main stack consists of React/Nest.js, combined with TypeScript, TypeORM, PostgreSQL, and Docker.

I have over 10 years of experience developing web and desktop applications in product-oriented and project-oriented companies that provide B2B solutions for small and medium businesses and government agencies.
I solved problems in complex schemes of relational databases and multi-tenant software architectures.
Lately, I've been focusing on full-stack web development and end-to-end software deployment.

projects.title: Payroll SMB
projects.description: Payroll SMB application provides a **solution for employers and employees to calculate salary** and taxes based on laws for chosen country

experience.title: Programmer, Team lead
experience.description: Development of the A5 Tariffication project for Educational organizations
